评论详情: I liked this but it was way too small for me so I gave it away.
I’m 5’5 and 125 and the small fits perfectly! super cute and a good length

I ordered a top almost identical to this one from a different brand and it was huge. So I decided to order this in a Medium instead of my XL. While it does run a little large, if def doesn’t run large like the last one. I’m 43” around my chest (38/40C) and although I was able to fit into this it was a little too tight for comfort. My daughter who is a 34DD was able to fit into this comfortably and it looks stunning on her. I love the square neckline, but it’s not too open. You can still wear a regular style bra with this - no need for a strapless or bar with straps that are set wide apart. It’s very soft and washed well on cold (hung to dry), no bleeding. The lace adds a very feminine touch. I recommend this top and the size guide. But if you want a snug fit, I’d suggest going down a size.

I wore this as a layering shirt, as it's winter and getting quite cold! It worked great! It's a nice comfortable material, the sleeves are the perfect length for me, it is a good shape and fit true to size. I like it! I would definitely purchase more of them.
